final_jeopardy.answer: (2 of) Meryl Streep, Ingrid Bergman, Helen Hayes, Jessica Lange, & Maggie Smith
final_jeopardy.clue: 2 of the 5 women to win both Best Actress & Best Supporting Actress Oscars
